channel.title: housewares on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in housewares on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Linens 'n Things Logo
Linens ‘n Things was a Clifton, New Jersey-based big-box retailer specializing in home textiles, housewares, and decorative home accessories. The chain operated 571 stores in 47 U.S. states and six Canadian provinces, and had 7,300 employees as of December 2006. The company’s business strategy was “to offer a broad selection of high quality, brand name home furnishings merchandise at exceptional everyday values, provide superior guest service, and maintain low operating costs.
You can download theLinens n Thingslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Linens n Things
item.description: Linens ‘n Things was a Clifton, New Jersey-based big-box retailer specializing in home textiles, housewares, and decorative home accessories. The chain operated 571 stores in 47 U.S. states and six Canadian provinces, and had 7,300 employees as of December 2006. The company’s business strategy was “to offer a broad selection of high quality, brand name home furnishings merchandise at exceptional everyday values, provide superior guest service, and maintain low operating costs.
